item.title: About Changhyeon Nam
item.content:encoded:
Hi there! I’m Changhyeon Nam, a software engineer and researcher with a strong interest in large language models (LLMs), particularly in post-training and inference. These days, I’m also studying Kubernetes (K8s). This blog is where I share my thoughts, experiences, and insights on various topics.

Looking forward to sharing and connecting with you!

Changhyeon Nam, 2025
